features: BANANA ENRICHED: XHC nourishing shampoo and conditioner enriched with Banana, to leave your hair feeling sleek, shiny and smooth. This delightfully fragrant shampoo and conditioner deeply nourishes hair and leaves it feeling softer and looking shinier.

SMOOTH & SHINY HAIR: Shampoo and conditioner help effectively remove impurities and refreshes and rebalances hair for healthy manageability. This moisturising shampoo and Conditioner help rebalance hair's natural moisture. Naturally derived cleansers help lift away impurities without over-stripping, leaving hair shiny, healthy looking.

IMPROVE HAIR QUALITY: Accelerates body circulation on the scalp enhances the messiness of hair roots, promotes melanin synthesis, improves hair quality. Provide instant nutrition, enhance smooth and gloss of hair.

UNIQUE FORMULA: Unique hair care formula, hair healthier and smoother. This shampoo and conditioner gently cleanses hair, leaving it beautifully shiny. This thick and creamy conditioner leaves hair beautifully soft and tangle-free. It contains real banana puree.
description: Product description Features : SLES and Paraben free shampoo. Paraben-Free conditioner. Dermatologically tested. Leaves hair nourished, fragrant and feeling softer. Comes in a plastic bottle with a flip open/close lid. Developed in Uk. How To Use : Apply a generous amount of shampoo to wet hair, massage into a lather then rinses thoroughly with clean water. Repeat if required. After washing with XHC Banana Shampoo, apply conditioner to damp hair and gently massage into hair, working through to the ends. Leave for 3-5 minutes then rinse well with clean water. Safety Warnings : Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with clean water. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Keep out of the reach of children. Specifications : Product Dimensions : 17x12x6cm Brand : XHC Net Content : 400ml Package Includes : 1x XHC Xpel Hair Care Banana Shampoo and Conditioner Combo Ingredients : Shampoo Ingredients : Aqua/Water (Solvent/Diluent), Musa Paradisica Fruit/Musa Paradisica (Banana) Fruit (Emollient/Lubricant), Cetearyl Alcohol (Emulsifier), Cetrimonium Chloride (Hair Conditioning Agent), Phenoxyethanol (Preservative), Hydroxyethylcellulose (Stabiliser/Thickener), Lecithin (Stabiliser/Emulsifier), Mel/Honey (Natural Additive), Panthenol (Hair Conditioning Agent), Propylene Glycol Conditioner Ingredients : Aqua/Water (Solvent/Diluent), Musa Paradisica Fruit/Musa Paradisica (Banana) Fruit, Parfum/Fragrance (Fragrance), Benzyl Alcohol (Preservative), Ascorbic Acid (Antioxidant), Citric Acid (pH Adjuster), Sodium Chloride (Viscosity Modifier), Sodium Hydroxide (pH Adjuster), CI 15985 Directions Apply shampoo to wet hair, massage into a lather, rinse thoroughly, apply conditioner to damp hair, gently massage, leave for 3-5 minutes, rinse well.
